Articles.Content:
I've looked around here but haven't seen anything. Im sure it exists. 

I would like to create an object that reflects like a view port, it doesn't need to be back lit, its going to be an observation deck for a factory and so it needs basically to appear like one way glass. 

Im thinking this has to represent added texture layers on top of the UV mapped textures.

If you just want a simple shiny metal-like polished surface, the stock KSP/Specular or KSP/Bumped Specular shaders in Unity's KSP PartTools will suffice.

However, if you're looking for a true mirror-like reflection, you will need to use the TRreflection PartModule from the TextureReplacer plugin to specify the meshes you want to be reflective.
